equipment.name: Dryer, steam-tube 2.4 m diameter, 350-1200 m2  (Perry's)
equipment.note: Overall diameter 2.438 m, containing 90 tubes of 114 mm diameter. Information from Swenson Process Equipment as reproduced in Perry's 8th ed. Scaling is done by increasing length (e.g.for diameter = 0.965 m and length = 4.572 m, tube surface area = 21.4 m2, while for diameter = 0.965 m and length = 9.144 m, tube surface area = 44.6 m2). Values above 800 m2 exceed the range provided by Swenson, assuming length can be extended to ~37 m, and should be considered tentative. Override the upper limit, if desired, by setting "S upper" in the Equipment Library to 800. This will restrict available sizes to those provided by Swenson.
